scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run type-check && echo '✅ Basic quality checks passed - add unit tests here later'
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: firebase use portail-jhmh-staging && npm run deploy:all && firebase use portail-jhmh
scripts.deploy:production: firebase use portail-jhmh && npm run deploy:all
scripts.test:functions:watch: cd functions && python3 -c "import time; import subprocess; print('🔍 Watching functions...'); subprocess.run(['python3', 'test_validation.py'])"
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo '✅ Build test successful'
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:build && npm run test:functions
scripts.validate:pre-deploy: npm run test:all && echo '🎉 Ready for deployment!'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && cd functions && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.logs:all: npm run logs:functions && npm run logs:hosting
scripts.status: echo '📊 Project Status:' && npm run lint --silent && npm run type-check --silent && echo '✅ All checks passed'
scripts.health: curl -s https://portail-jhmh.web.app > /dev/null && echo '✅ Production is healthy' || echo '❌ Production issues detected'
scripts.health:staging: curl -s https://portail-jhmh-staging.web.app > /dev/null && echo '✅ Staging is healthy' || echo '❌ Staging issues detected'
scripts.workflow:pr: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.workflow:deploy: npm run validate:pre-deploy && echo '🚀 Ready to deploy to staging'
scripts.workflow:hotfix: npm run lint:fix && npm run type-check && npm run build && echo '🔥 Hotfix ready'
